title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 658.18 - Service of papers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 658.18 - Service of papers

State Regulations

All notices, papers and intermediary process connected
with a hearing, other than the first notice of hearing or notice of hearing
addressed to a party for the first time and the order containing the final
determination of the commissioner, may be served by ordinary
mail. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
658.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
